name: @metreeca/tool
description: A lightweight React toolkit for rapid REST/JSON-LD frontend development

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md dist && copyup 'code/**/*.css' dist
scripts.crate: npm run build && tar cf package.tar dist
scripts.issue: npm run build && npm publish --access public ./dist
scripts.share: npm run crate && for i in $(cat package.lst); do npm install --no-save --prefix $i package.tar; done
